#Text=Appreciate the Uniqueness in You
#Text=Dear friends , the world will say ' No ! ' in a thousand ways .
#Text=Each No !
#Text=you hear has the potential to erode your confidence bit by bit until you quit all together .
#Text=You have to continue to do what you are doing , if you are certain you are doing the right thing .
#Text=Self esteem and self confidence are the key stones to success and happiness .
#Text=Here are some steps you must follow and internalize if you wish to raise your self worth and confidence level .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Stop comparing yourself with other people , Say and think good about yourself .
#Text=Everyone makes mistakes , but it is how you react to them that makes a difference .
#Text=Do n't beat yourself up over a slip up ; forgive yourself , laugh it off , and learn from it .
#Text=Associate with similar people .
#Text=It is said that you are that he average of five of your closest friends .
#Text=Try to surround yourself only with positive people who reflect your values and that you can learn from .
#Text=Keep people near you who will encourage , motivate , and accept you as you are .
#Text=Do not keep " vanity friends .
